name: Buckys Brawl
description:
ACTION!!!!

ACTION!!!!

ACTION!!!!!

BUCKY IS AN ADVENTURER WITH CAPITAL A ATTITUDE!!!

After being captured for being entirely too rad he's been thrown in an arena... OF DEATH!!!

Will he survive???????

For the retrograde jam. Meant to be like a game from the late 80's early 90's left on the cutting room floor. The above stuff is just to fit that theme. 

The attached docx is a devlog following my thoughts throughout the project.
